description: The WHO says Europe is at "high risk" of a new wave of infections in the New Year.
title: Covid-19: Europeans urged to wear masks for family Christmas
title_page: Covid-19: Europeans urged to wear masks for family Christmas - BBC News
maintext: If you are reading this page and can't see the form you will need to visit the mobile version of the BBC website to submit your question or comment or you can email us at HaveYourSay@bbc.co.uk. Please include your name, age and location with any submission.
